About the film:

Jake Sully - a former Marine, confined to a wheelchair. Despite the weakness of the body, Jake in the shower is still a warrior. He gets an assignment to travel a few light years to the base of earthlings on the planet Pandora, where the corporation is rich rare mineral, which is of great importance to exit the Earth from the energy crisis.
